info.title: PPS API Documentation - Hotel Unified Express Path
info.description: OpenAPI specification for the PPS Hotel APIs.

get.description: This endpoint is similar to `Express.Results`, but is more efficient and faster by returning a pricing summary (single rate) per property that is perfect for displaying a search results-style page.

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: The total number of adult occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `children` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: The total number of child occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `adults` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: cluster_search
parameters.description: Toggles cluster search for city_id searches. Enabling this will refine the city search results to the actual city instead of surfacing neighbouring cities, for example, Toronto vs Vaughn city.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: customer_nationality
parameters.description: Pass the customer's country of passport to get the rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.

parameters.name: distribution_types
parameters.description: Filter the rates by the `distribution_type` value of a rate. You can pass one or more comma-separated values, and the values can be PUBLIC, PRIVATE, or FLEXIBLE_BENCHMARK (case-insenstive). See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate#distribution-type) for more information about distribution types.

parameters.name: featured_hotel_ids
parameters.description: PPN Hotel ID(s) to add to featured hotels in the results list

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: You can request translated content in a supported language. Language code should be in IETF standards with a lowercase language code (you can also add a trailing uppercase country code). See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of hotels returned by a given number. If omitted, no hotel limiting is performed.

parameters.name: limit_to_country
parameters.description: Limits results to country provided. Valid Options: true or false.

parameters.name: output_version
parameters.description: Default output version is 4. You can pass this parameter to request a previous version of output if needed.

parameters.name: partner_member_token
parameters.description: The partner's member token is used to obtain member deal rates. Activate member deals through Account Management team to use a paratner member token.

parameters.name: property_type_ids
parameters.description: Filter by property type ids. See the [Property Type Filter Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/property-types) for more detail.

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort results by a given option/ranking. Valid Options: gs = guest_score, sr = star_rating, lp = lowest_price, hp = highest_price, ds = distance, mp = most_popular.

getHotelExpress.Availability.description: The Express.Availability response structure for a successful request.

results.description: The results are grouped under this cluster.

sort_data.description: The sorting information of the results.

sort_by.description: Indicates what criteria/ranking is used to sort the results. Note that the most_popular sort is based on the `hotel_sort_score_ppn` values in Hotel downloads.

address_line_one.example: 134 Fourth Avenue (corner Of 13th Street And Fourth Avenue)

latitude.description: Latitude for the geo location of hotel.

longitude.description: Longitude for the geo location of hotel.

external_urls.description: Provides the deeplink URLs. This is a feature specific to deep linking option and may not always be available in the response schema.

type.description: The type of the external link.

inventory.description: The supplier who provides the inventory and the rates.

url.description: The linked URL with the search criteria that directs a user to the supplier's website.

price_summary.description: Price summary for the lowest rate available from this inventory supplier.

display_currency.description: The display currency for the rate. See the [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for a detailed explanation of price breakdown.

display_price.description: Price of rate in display currency.

description.example: Includes a 42-inch flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi.

bedding_data.description: Bedding data. Only available if `room_bedding=1` is passed in request.

areas.description: Lists one or more areas that have beds. A bed area is a physical space in a booked room separate from other physical spaces and has one or more beds. For example, a booked room may have a living area with a pullout couch and a bedroom area with a king bed.

type.description: A list of areas where one or more beds are in. For example, beds can be in a separate BEDROOM, or a sofa bed might be part of a shared LIVING_ROOM.

bed_groups.description: A bed group is one of the potential combinations of bedding configuration in an area. For example, a room that is sold to sleep 2 occupants may have either a bed group with 1 Queen bed OR, a bed group with 1 Twin bed AND 1 Single bed. The guests will get one of the available bed configurations from the possible combinations. The choice of configuration is at the discretion of the property. But the guests will receive all of the beds listed under a specific bed group.

beds.description: One or more beds of the same type. For example, 2 QUEEN-sized bed types may be listed.

type.description: The type of bed. For example, a QUEEN or KING.

count.description: Number of beds in this type.

rate_data.description: See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about this data cluster.

payment_type.description: See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about payment types.

board_type.description: The board type of the rate such as whether the rate is breakfast only or all inclusive. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

program_types.description: Program type of rate if applicable. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about program types.

occupancy_limit.description: The limit for number of adults + children. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

available_rooms.description: The number of available rooms at this rate. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

price_details.description: The breakdown of the price details for the rate. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

baseline_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

source_currency.description: Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

source_price.description: Source price of rate in source currency.

source_sub_total.description: Subtotal in source currency. Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

source_total.description: Total in source currency. Total is with applicable taxes and fees.

display_currency.description: The display currency is for display purposes only. Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

display_price.description: Price of rate in display currency.

display_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

display_total.description: Total is with applicable taxes and fees.

refund_type.description: Indicates the refund type as whether full refund, partial refund or no refund.

language.description: Indicates the language of the delivered rate data values. Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

Indicates the language of the hotel and room details.  Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) to learn more.

room_data.title: Double Room
room_data.description: Air-conditioned room with flat-screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, a minibar, a safe and a private bathroom.

get.description: This endpoint returns multiple rates from all available properties for an accommodation search. This is best suited for forward distributors or similar businesses that require multiple rates from multiple properties.

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: The total number of adult occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `children` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: The total number of child occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `adults` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: cluster_search
parameters.description: Toggles cluster search for city_id searches. Enabling this will refine the city search results to the actual city instead of surfacing neighbouring cities, for example, Toronto vs Vaughn city.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: customer_nationality
parameters.description: Pass the customer's country of passport to get the rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.

parameters.name: featured_hotel_ids
parameters.description: PPN Hotel ID(s) to add to featured hotels in the results list

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: You can request translated content in a supported language. Language code should be in IETF standards with a lowercase language code (you can also add a trailing uppercase country code). See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of hotels returned by a given number. If omitted, no hotel limiting is performed.

parameters.name: limit_to_country
parameters.description: Limits results to country provided. Valid Options: true or false.

parameters.name: output_version
parameters.description: Standard output version is version 4. You can pass this parameter to request a previous version of output if needed.

parameters.name: partner_member_token
parameters.description: The partner's member token is used to obtain member deal rates. Activate member deals through Account Management team to use a paratner member token.

parameters.name: property_type_ids
parameters.description: Filter by property type ids. See the [Property Type Filter Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/property-types) for more detail.

parameters.name: rate_limit
parameters.description: Number passed to limit the number of rates returned. Defaults to returning all available rates

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort results by a given option/ranking. Valid Options: gs = guest_score, sr = star_rating, lp = lowest_price, hp = highest_price, ds = distance, mp = most_popular (note that the most_popular sort is based on the `hotel_sort_score_ppn` values in Hotel downloads).

cancel_policy_description.example: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

insurance_available.description: If insurance is available for a rate. This returns 1 if available.

insurance_allowed.description: If insurance is allowed for a rate. This returns 1 if allowed.

refund_type.description: Indicates the refund type as whether full refund, partial refund or no refund.

cvc_required.description: Indicates if the cvc code is required for the payment card details. If this is `true` (required), you need to pass the `cvc_code` parameter with the `Express.Book` request in addition to the other required parameters.

rate_amenity_data.description: A list of rate amenities if available.

language.description: Indicates the language of the delivered rate data values. Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

Indicates the language of the hotel and room details.  Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) to learn more.

getHotelExpress.Results.description: The standard error response from the server.

hotel_data.name: Hilton Garden Inn Winnipeg South
hotel_data.hotel_description: Located in Winnipeg and with Forks Market reachable within 5.9 miles, Hilton Garden Inn Winnipeg South provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. The property is around 6 miles from MTS Centre, 6.1 miles from Canadian Museum for Human Rights and 7 miles from McPhillips Street Station Casino. The property has a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Hilton Garden Inn Winnipeg South offers a hot tub. Union Station is 5.8 miles from the accommodation, while Assiniboine Zoo is 3 miles away. The nearest airport is Winnipeg James Armstrong Richardson International Airport, 6.8 miles from Hilton Garden Inn Winnipeg South.

pet_friendly.policy: Pets are allowed. Charges may apply.

hotel_data.name: Best Western Plus Pembina Inn & Suites
hotel_data.hotel_description: Offering an indoor pool and a fitness center, Best Western Plus Pembina Inn & Suites is located in Winnipeg. Free Wi-Fi access is available. The Manitoba Museum is 10 minutes’ drive away. Air-conditioned rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen cable TV. There is also a refrigerator. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box and ironing facilities. At Best Western Plus Pembina Inn & Suites you will find a hot tub. Other facilities offered include meeting facilities and a vending machine. The property offers free parking. The hotel is 4.5 mi from MTS Center, 4.2 mi from Winnipeg Convention Center and 4.2 mi from Forks Market. Winnipeg Airport is 6.8 mi away.

get.description: This endpoint returns multiple rates for a given hotel or an `Express.Results` rate bundle.

parameters.name: MultiContract Search Options
parameters.description: The query type

ppn_bundle.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that is used to identify a specific rate. This `ppn_bundle` is provided in the `Express.Results` or the `Express.Availability` response.

oneOf.title: Hotel + check in and check out dates + rooms
oneOf.description: Hotel, check in and check out dates, and rooms

adults.description: The total number of adult occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `children` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

children.description: The total number of child occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `adults` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

rooms.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants

parameters.name: customer_nationality
parameters.description: Pass the customer's country of passport to get the rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.

parameters.name: include_prepaid_fee_rates
parameters.description: Request for rates that have mandatory resort fees that can be paid at time of booking.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: You can request translated content in a supported language. Language code should be in IETF standards with a lowercase language code (you can also add a trailing uppercase country code). See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

parameters.name: output_version
parameters.description: Default output version is 4. You can pass this parameter to request a previous version of output if needed.

parameters.name: rate_tracking_id
parameters.description: An ID used by Priceline Contracts to identify the contract's rate.

parameters.name: Room Content (Dynamic)
parameters.description: Dynamic room content control. See the [Room Content Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-content#room-content-control-in-booking-path-with-output-version-4) for more details.

room_amenities.description: Value is 0 or 1. Passing value 1 enables the display of amenities exposed from room content.

room_bedding.description: Value is 0 or 1. Passing value 1 enables the display of `bedding_data` exposed from room content.

room_photos.description: Value is 0 or 1. Passing value 1 enables the display of photos exposed from room content.

room_photo_sizes.description: Decides which sizes of photos will be displayed when room_photos=1 is passed. You can pass a comma-separated list of one or more values: small, medium, large

room_photo_limit.description: Decides how many photos will be displayed when room_photos=1 is passed. You can pass any numeric value.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: trackingid_value
parameters.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

getHotelExpress.MultiContract.description: The Express.MultiContract response structure for a successful request.

results.description: The results are grouped under this cluster.

property_type_id.description: The id that can be mapped to identify a property type. See the [Property Type Filter Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/property-types) for more detail.

hotel_description.example: Hop on the shuttle to LaGuardia Airport from this Queens hotel.

address_line_one.example: 134 Fourth Avenue (corner Of 13th Street And Fourth Avenue)

latitude.description: Latitude for the geo location of hotel

longitude.description: Longitude for the geo location of hotel

check_in_information.description: The schema for check-in information such as if standard check-in.

standard_check_in.description: Indicates whether the property provides traditional check-in such as a hotel/reception desk. See the [Check-in information guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/non-hotel-accommodation#check-in-information) for more details.

description.example: Includes a 42-inch flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi.

bedding_data.description: Bedding data. Only available if `room_bedding=1` is passed in request.

areas.description: Lists one or more areas that have beds. A bed area is a physical space in a booked room separate from other physical spaces and has one or more beds. For example, a booked room may have a living area with a pullout couch and a bedroom area with a king bed.

type.description: A list of areas where one or more beds are in. For example, beds can be in a separate BEDROOM, or a sofa bed might be part of a shared LIVING_ROOM.

bed_groups.description: A bed group is one of the potential combinations of bedding configuration in an area. For example, a room that is sold to sleep 2 occupants may have either a bed group with 1 Queen bed OR, a bed group with 1 Twin bed AND 1 Single bed. The guests will get one of the available bed configurations from the possible combinations. The choice of configuration is at the discretion of the property. But the guests will receive all of the beds listed under a specific bed group.

beds.description: One or more beds of the same type. For example, 2 QUEEN-sized bed types may be listed.

type.description: The type of bed. For example, a QUEEN or KING.

count.description: Number of beds in this type.

amenities.description: This is only returned if dynamic room content is requested (the `room_amenities=1` parameter is passed with the request).

photos.description: This is only returned if dynamic room content is requested (the `room_photos=1` parameter is passed with the request).

rate_data.description: See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about this data cluster.

payment_type.description: See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about payment types.

board_type.description: The board type of the rate such as whether the rate is breakfast only or all inclusive. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

program_types.description: Program type of rate if applicable. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about program types.

occupancy_limit.description: The limit for number of adults + children. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

available_rooms.description: The number of available rooms at this rate. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

price_details.description: The breakdown of the price details for the rate. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

baseline_property_fee.description: The price of any property fees collected for all rooms and nights.

baseline_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

source_currency.description: Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

source_price.description: Source price of rate in source currency.

source_property_fee.description: The source price of any property fees collected for all rooms and nights.

source_sub_total.description: Subtotal in source currency. Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

source_total.description: Total in source currency. Total is with applicable taxes and fees.

display_currency.description: The display currency only. Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

display_price.description: Price of rate in display currency.

display_property_fee.description: The price of any fees collected by property for all rooms and nights.

display_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

display_total.description: Total is with applicable taxes and fees.

type.description: The promo type.

display_strikeout_price.description: The promo strikeout price in display.

required.description: If promo is applied as required.

cancellation_details.description: Provides information related to rate cancellation criteria. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details about this data cluster.

date_after.description: Indicates when is cancellation allowed for a rate. This is the start date (of the date range) that the customer can cancel the booking to be eligible for *_refund amount. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details.

date_before.description: In dicates when is cancellation allowed for the rate. This is the last date (of the date range) that the customer can cancel a booking to be eligible for *_refund amount. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details.

penalty_nights.description: The number of penalty nights deducted from refund.

source_currency.description: The source currency for amounts and charges.

source_processing_fee.description: The processing fee in source currency.

source_cancellation_fee.description: The cancellation fee in source currency for refund/cancellation.

source_refund.description: The refund amount in source currency if refund is applicable.

source_total_charges.description: The total charges for cancellation in source currency.

display_currency.description: The display currency for amounts and charges.

display_processing_fee.description: The processing fee in display currency.

display_cancellation_fee.description: The cancellation fee in display currency for refund/cancellation.

display_refund.description: The refund amount in display currency.

display_total_charges.description: The total charges for cancellation in display currency.

policy_data.description: Rate policies. It is imperative that you display the these policies.

items.example: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

display_price.description: The price displayed to the customer

source_price.description: TThe price charged to the customer for insurance.

ti_html.description: The HTML block to be displayed to the user if insurance is being offered. Use the provided HTML block and do not make changes to the HTML structure. You can use the `text_block` data or the `ti_html`

text_block.description: An array of string text blocks describing the insurance policy.

insurance_available.description: If insurance is available for a rate. This returns 1 if available.

insurance_allowed.description: If insurance is allowed for a rate. This returns 1 if allowed.

refund_type.description: Indicates the refund type as to whether full refund, partial refund or no refund.

cvc_required.description: Indicates if the cvc code is required for payment card details. If this is `true` (required), you need to pass the `cvc_code` parameter with the `Express.Book` request in addition to the other required parameters.

language.description: Indicates the language of the delivered rate data values. Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

items.example: {"sentence_one":{"summary":"first sentence","value":"In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction, the charge to your method of payment will include a charge for Taxes and Fees. This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain. Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location."},"sentence_two":{"summary":"second sentence","value":"For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services."},"sentence_three":{"summary":"third sentence","value":"Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply."},"sentence_four":{"summary":"fourth sentence","value":"Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ('GST') for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus."}}

selective_options.description: Includes any options selective to applicable features.

comments_allowed.description: If `comments` are accepted by the property (passed in `Book` request), this node will be returned as 1. See [special requests guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/non-hotel-accommodation#special-instructions) for more details.

language.description: Indicates the language of the hotel and room details.  Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) to learn more.

hotel_data.name: art'otel berlin mitte
hotel_data.hotel_description: This hotel in central Berlin's Mitte district offers international cuisine and free WiFi. It is opposite Märkisches Museum Underground Station, just 2 stops from Alexanderplatz. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at the art'otel Berlin Mitte are decorated in light colours, and include original works by local artist, Georg Baselitz. Each room features a satellite TV, and minibar. A rich breakfast is available each morning. The Upside Down restaurant and bar offers freshly prepared meals and cocktails. The art'otel Berlin Mitte lies in a quiet part of the Mitte district, next to the River Spree. Museum Island and the historic Nikolai Quarter are a 10-minute walk away.

room_data.title: Art Double Room
room_data.description:
Spacious room including a flat-screen TV with satellite channels,  a mini-bar and an private bathroom with free toiletries.

Sleeps 2 adults.

cancellation_details.description: This booking is fully refundable if you cancel before 2022-01-13 02:00 PM.
This booking is Non-refundable after 2022-01-13 02:00 PM.

policy_data.title: Cancellation Policy
paragraph_data: This booking is fully refundable if you cancel before 2022-01-13 02:00 PM. This booking is Non-refundable after 2022-01-13 02:00 PM.

policy_data.title: Age Restriction Disclosure
paragraph_data: The reservation holder must be 21 years of age or older.

policy_data.title: Guarantee Policy
paragraph_data: Reservation is guaranteed for arrival on the confirmed check-in date only. If you don't check-in to the hotel on the first day of your reservation and you do not alert the hotel in advance the remaining portion of your reservation will be canceled and you will not be entitled to a refund.

policy_data.title: Room Charge Disclosure
paragraph_data: Your credit card is charged the total cost at time of purchase. Prices and room availability are not guaranteed until full payment is received.

policy_data.title: Check-in Policy
paragraph_data: The reservation holder must present a valid photo ID and credit card at check-in.  The credit card is required for any additional hotel specific service fees or incidental charges or fees that may be charged by the hotel to the customer at checkout. These charges may be mandatory (e.g., resort fees) or optional (parking, phone calls or mini-bar charges) and are not included in the room rate.

get.description: This endpoint takes in a given indivdual rate bundle from `Express.Results` or `Express.MultiContract` and returns the rate information and a bundle to book the rate.

parameters.name: ppn_bundle
parameters.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that is used to identify a specific rate. This `ppn_bundle` is provided in the `Express.Results`, or the `Express.MultiContract` response.

parameters.name: customer_nationality
parameters.description: Pass the customer's country of passport to get the rates with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: You can request translated content in a supported language. Language code should be in IETF standards with a lowercase language code (you can also add a trailing uppercase country code). See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

parameters.name: output_version
parameters.description: Default output version is 4. You can pass this parameter to request a previous version of output if needed.

parameters.name: rate_tracking_id
parameters.description: An ID used by Priceline Contracts to identify the contract's rate.

parameters.name: Room Content (Dynamic)
parameters.description: See the [Room Content Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-content#room-content-control-in-booking-path-with-output-version-4) for more details.

room_amenities.description: Value is 0 or 1. Passing value 1 enables the display of amenities exposed from room content.

room_bedding.description: Value is 0 or 1. Passing value 1 enables the display of `bedding_data` exposed from room content.

room_photos.description: Value is 0 or 1. Passing value 1 enables the display of photos exposed from room content.

room_photo_sizes.description: Decides which sizes of photos will be displayed when room_photos=1 is passed. You can pass a comma-separated list of one or more values: small, medium, large

room_photo_limit.description: Decides how many photos will be displayed when room_photos=1 is passed. You can pass any numeric value.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: trackingid_value
parameters.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

getHotelExpress.Contract.description: The Express.Contract response structure for a successful request.

results.description: The results are grouped under this cluster.

property_type_id.description: The id that can be mapped to identify a property type. See the [Property Type Filter Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/property-types) for more detail.

hotel_description.example: Hop on the shuttle to LaGuardia Airport from this Queens hotel.

address_line_one.example: 134 Fourth Avenue (corner Of 13th Street And Fourth Avenue)

latitude.description: Latitude for the geo location of hotel

longitude.description: Longitude for the geo location of hotel

cleanliness_score.description: The cleanliness score of the hotel.

check_in_information.description: The schema for check-in information such as if standard check-in.

standard_check_in.description: Indicates whether the property provides traditional check-in such as a hotel/reception desk. See the [Check-in information guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/non-hotel-accommodation#check-in-information) for more details.

description.example: Includes a 42-inch flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi.

bedding_data.description: Bedding data. Only available if `room_bedding=1` is passed in request.

areas.description: Lists one or more areas that have beds. A bed area is a physical space in a booked room separate from other physical spaces and has one or more beds. For example, a booked room may have a living area with a pullout couch and a bedroom area with a king bed.

type.description: A list of areas where one or more beds are in. For example, beds can be in a separate BEDROOM, or a sofa bed might be part of a shared LIVING_ROOM.

bed_groups.description: A bed group is one of the potential combinations of bedding configuration in an area. For example, a room that is sold to sleep 2 occupants may have either a bed group with 1 Queen bed OR, a bed group with 1 Twin bed AND 1 Single bed. The guests will get one of the available bed configurations from the possible combinations. The choice of configuration is at the discretion of the property. But the guests will receive all of the beds listed under a specific bed group.

beds.description: One or more beds of the same type. For example, 2 QUEEN-sized bed types may be listed.

type.description: The type of bed. For example, a QUEEN or KING.

count.description: Number of beds in this type.

amenities.description: This is only returned if dynamic room content is requested (the `room_amenities=1` parameter is passed with the request).

photos.description: This is only returned if dynamic room content is requested (the `room_photos=1` parameter is passed with the request).

rate_data.description: See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about this data cluster.

payment_type.description: See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about payment types.

board_type.description: The board type of the rate such as whether the rate is breakfast only or all inclusive. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

program_types.description: Program type of rate if applicable. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about program types.

occupancy_limit.description: The limit for number of adults + children. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

available_rooms.description: The number of available rooms at this rate. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

price_details.description: The breakdown of the price details for the rate. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

baseline_property_fee.description: The price of any property fees collected for all rooms and nights.

baseline_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

source_currency.description: Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

source_price.description: Source price of rate in source currency.

source_property_fee.description: The source price of any property fees collected for all rooms and nights.

source_sub_total.description: Subtotal in source currency. Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

source_total.description: Total in source currency. Total is with applicable taxes and fees.

display_currency.description: The display currency only. Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

display_price.description: Price of rate in display currency.

display_property_fee.description: The price of any fees collected by property for all rooms and nights.

display_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

display_total.description: Total is with applicable taxes and fees.

type.description: The promo type.

display_strikeout_price.description: The promo strikeout price in display.

required.description: If promo is applied as required.

cancellation_details.description: Provides information related to rate cancellation criteria. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details about this data cluster.

date_after.description: Indicates when is cancellation allowed for a rate. This is the start date (of the date range) that the customer can cancel the booking to be eligible for *_refund amount. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details.

date_before.description: In dicates when is cancellation allowed for the rate. This is the last date (of the date range) that the customer can cancel a booking to be eligible for *_refund amount. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details.

penalty_nights.description: The number of penalty nights deducted from refund.

source_currency.description: The source currency for amounts and charges.

source_processing_fee.description: The processing fee in source currency.

source_cancellation_fee.description: The cancellation fee in source currency for refund/cancellation.

source_refund.description: The refund amount in source currency if refund is applicable.

source_total_charges.description: The total charges for cancellation in source currency.

display_currency.description: The display currency for amounts and charges.

display_processing_fee.description: The processing fee in display currency.

display_cancellation_fee.description: The cancellation fee in display currency for refund/cancellation.

display_refund.description: The refund amount in display currency.

display_total_charges.description: The total charges for cancellation in display currency.

policy_data.description: Rate policies. It is imperative that you display the these policies.

items.example: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

display_price.description: The price displayed to the customer

source_price.description: TThe price charged to the customer for insurance.

ti_html.description: The HTML block to be displayed to the user if insurance is being offered. Use the provided HTML block and do not make changes to the HTML structure. You can use the `text_block` data or the `ti_html`

text_block.description: An array of string text blocks describing the insurance policy.

insurance_available.description: If insurance is available for a rate. This returns 1 if available.

refund_type.description: Indicates the refund type as to whether full refund, partial refund or no refund.

cvc_required.description: Indicates if the cvc code is required for payment card details. If this is `true` (required), you need to pass the `cvc_code` parameter with the `Express.Book` request in addition to the other required parameters.

rate_amenity_data.description: A list of rate amenities if available.

language.description: Indicates the language of the delivered rate data values. Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

items.example: {"sentence_one":{"summary":"first sentence","value":"In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction, the charge to your method of payment will include a charge for Taxes and Fees. This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain. Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location."},"sentence_two":{"summary":"second sentence","value":"For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services."},"sentence_three":{"summary":"third sentence","value":"Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply."},"sentence_four":{"summary":"fourth sentence","value":"Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ('GST') for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus."}}

selective_options.description: Includes any options selective to applicable features.

comments_allowed.description: If `comments` are accepted by the property (passed in `Book` request), this node will be returned as 1. See [special requests guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/non-hotel-accommodation#special-instructions) for more details.

language.description: Indicates the language of the hotel and room details.  Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) to learn more.

post.description:
This endpoint lets you book an Express hotel rate using an `Express.Contract` bundle.
See the [booking status handling page](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/handle_booking_status) for reccomendations on handling bookings for PENDING and CONSOLIDATOR status.

format.description: The format of your request. We recommend requesting json2 format response.

address_line_one.description: First line of card holder's address.

address_postal_code.description: Card holder's zip or postal code.

email.description: Customer's email address to be associated with the booking. We'll use this email address for sending transaction email such as confirmations and cancellations.

country_code.description: Card holder's address country code in two character Alpha-2 ISO format.

card_type.description: Credit card type used for booking. Valid Options: AX (American Express), DS (Discover), MC (Master Card), Euro/Mastercard, VI (VISA)

expires.description: Expiration date of the customer's credit card (MMYYYY).

ppn_bundle.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that is used to identify a specific rate. This `ppn_bundle` is provided in the `Express.Contract` response.

address_line_two.description: Second line of card holder's address.

address_state_code.description: Card holder's state or province code. This is required if insurance is purchased for the booking where `add_insurance=1`. Note that insurance purchase is only available if the card address is in US and Canada (`country_code` is US or CA).

add_insurance.description: Specify if insurance is purchased for the booking. Valid Options: 0 = If no insurance, 1 = If insurance is purchased. If insurance is purchased, email address and a full billing address (including `address_state_code`) are required. Note that insurance purchase is only available if the card address is in US and Canada (`country_code` is US or CA).

allow_duplicate.description: Allow for duplicate bookings. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = True

bank_of_issue.description: Bank associated with the credit card.

client_ip.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

comments.description: Comment by customer at time of booking. Comments are only acceptable if `selective_options.comments_allowed` is 1 in Express.Contract response (this is how property indicates whether comments are accepted).

country_of_issue.description: Two character Alpha-2 ISO format country code associated with the issued credit card.

customer_nationality.description: Pass the customer's country of passport to book the rate with regional pricing. This is a two character ISO Alpha-2 country code. To retain the pricing when booking a regional priced rate, make sure to pass the same value that was passed in `customer_nationality` at search with the Express.Results/Express.Availability/Express.MultiContract/Express.Contract.

cvc_code.description: CVC code from the back of the payment card. This will be required if the `cvc_required` node is `true` for a rate in the search results reponse or in the `FlightContract` response.

device_type_id.description: Device type ID for sales tracking. Valid Options: 0 or 3 = Desktop , 1 = Mobile, 2 = Tablet, 4 = Phone.

guest_name_first.description: Passes the guest first names as string array items. Example:`guest_name_first[0]=Paul&guest_name_first[1]=Mary`. See the [Book Request Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-guest-customer-billing-names) for more information about passing guest names.

guest_name_middle.description: Passes the guest middle names as string array items. See the [Book Request Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-guest-customer-billing-names) for more information about passing guest names.

guest_name_last.description: Passes the guest last names as string array items. Example:`guest_name_last[0]=Johnson&guest_name_last[1]=Jones`. See the [Book Request Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-guest-customer-billing-names) for more information about passing guest names.

hotel_url.description: URL for a custom hotel page.

language.description: You can request translated content in a supported language. Language code should be in IETF standards with a lowercase language code (you can also add a trailing uppercase country code). See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

member_id.description: The customer's member/partner membership program ID. This value will be available in sales reports after a successful booking and is useful to track member engagement.

newsletter.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

newsletter_selected.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

phone_agent.description: If a customer used a phone agent to book. Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

review_url.description: URL for a custom hotel itinerary lookup page.

sale_method.description: Type of device or call center flag. Valid Options: phn = Phone (Call Center), mlb = Mobile, dsk = Desktop.

smoking.description: Smoking room preference for the customer.  Valid Options: 0 = No Preference, 1 = Non-Smoking, and 2 = Smoking.

year_of_birth.description: The customer's year of birth for unique SDN screening if necessary. See the [Error handling for SDN list screening guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/pps-api/guides/guide/hotel-guest-customer-billing-names#error-handling-for-sdn-list-screening) for details.

direct_billing.description: Activates direct billing. Value must be set as 1 to activate direct billing.

ppn_bundle.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that is used to identify a specific rate. This `ppn_bundle` is provided in the `Express.Contract` response.

email.description: Customer's email address to be associated with the booking. We'll use this email address for sending transaction email such as confirmations and cancellations.

allow_duplicate.description: Allow for duplicate bookings. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = True

client_ip.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

comments.description: Comment by customer at time of booking.

device_type_id.description: Device type ID for sales tracking. Valid Options: 0 or 3 = Desktop , 1 = Mobile, 2 = Tablet, 4 = Phone.

hotel_url.description: URL for a custom hotel page.

language.description: You can request translated content in a supported language. Language code should be in IETF standards with a lowercase language code (you can also add a trailing uppercase country code). See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

member_id.description: The customer's member/partner membership program ID. This value will be available in sales reports after a successful booking and is useful to track member engagement.

newsletter.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

newsletter_selected.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

review_url.description: URL for a custom hotel itinerary lookup page.

sale_method.description: Type of device or call center flag. Valid Options: phn = Phone (Call Center), mlb = Mobile, dsk = Desktop.

smoking.description: Smoking room preference for the customer.  Valid Options: 0 = No Preference, 1 = Non-Smoking, and 2 = Smoking.

year_of_birth.description: The customer's year of birth for unique SDN screening if necessary. See the [Error handling for SDN list screening guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/pps-api/guides/guide/hotel-guest-customer-billing-names#error-handling-for-sdn-list-screening) for details.

getHotelExpress.Book.description: The Express.Book response structure for a successful request.

results.description: The results are grouped under this cluster.

id.description: The itinerary ID/ booking ID for reference.

status.description: Itinerary status. See more details about the [reservation status in this Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-guest-customer-billing-names#status-of-reservation).

room_data.description: Room reservation information for the itinerary.

policy_data.description: It is imperative that you display the policy information.

type.description: Room policy descriptions such as cancellation policy description or if room is cancellable.

text.description: Room policy descriptions, or a policy value (for example, a boolean string where `IsCancelable=false`).
text.example: Each room in this reservation is subject to the hotel's cancellation policy which is: This reservation is non-refundable. There is no refund for no-shows or early checkouts.

card_last_four.description: The last four digits in the used payment card.

card_type.description: Card type used for the booking.

name.description: Guest name assigned to the room.

property_type_id.description: The id that can be mapped to identify a property type. See the [Property Type Filter Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/property-types) for more detail.

hotel_description.example: Hop on the shuttle to LaGuardia Airport from this Queens hotel.

address_line_one.example: 134 Fourth Avenue (corner Of 13th Street And Fourth Avenue)

latitude.description: Latitude for the geo location of hotel

longitude.description: Longitude for the geo location of hotel

review_score_data.description: Hotel review score data such as cleanliness score.

check_in_information.description: The schema for check-in information such as if standard check-in.

standard_check_in.description: Indicates whether the property provides traditional check-in such as a hotel/reception desk. See the [Check-in information guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/non-hotel-accommodation#check-in-information) for more details.

description.example: Includes a 42-inch flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi.

bedding_data.description: Bedding data. Only available if `room_bedding=1` is passed in request.

areas.description: Lists one or more areas that have beds. A bed area is a physical space in a booked room separate from other physical spaces and has one or more beds. For example, a booked room may have a living area with a pullout couch and a bedroom area with a king bed.

type.description: A list of areas where one or more beds are in. For example, beds can be in a separate BEDROOM, or a sofa bed might be part of a shared LIVING_ROOM.

bed_groups.description: A bed group is one of the potential combinations of bedding configuration in an area. For example, a room that is sold to sleep 2 occupants may have either a bed group with 1 Queen bed OR, a bed group with 1 Twin bed AND 1 Single bed. The guests will get one of the available bed configurations from the possible combinations. The choice of configuration is at the discretion of the property. But the guests will receive all of the beds listed under a specific bed group.

beds.description: One or more beds of the same type. For example, 2 QUEEN-sized bed types may be listed.

type.description: The type of bed. For example, a QUEEN or KING.

count.description: Number of beds in this type.

amenities.description: This is only returned if dynamic room content is requested (the `room_amenities=1` parameter is passed with the request).

photos.description: This is only returned if dynamic room content is requested (the `room_photos=1` parameter is passed with the request).

rate_data.description: The rate data cluster. Refer to the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

payment_type.description: See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about payment types.

board_type.description: The board type of the rate such as whether the rate is breakfast only or all inclusive. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

program_types.description: Program type of rate if applicable. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details about program types.

available_rooms.description: The number of available rooms at this rate. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

price_details.description: The breakdown of the price details for the rate. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

baseline_property_fee.description: The price of any property fees collected for all rooms and nights.

baseline_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

source_currency.description: Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

source_price.description: Source price of rate in source currency.

source_property_fee.description: The source price of any property fees collected for all rooms and nights.

source_sub_total.description: Source subtotal without taxes and fees.

source_total.description: Source total with applicable taxes and fees.

display_currency.description: The display currency only. Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

display_price.description: Price of rate in display currency.

display_property_fee.description: The price of any fees collected by property for all rooms and nights.

display_sub_total.description: Subtotal is without taxes and fees.

display_total.description: Total is with applicable taxes and fees.

type.description: The promo type.

display_strikeout_price.description: The promo strikeout price in display.

required.description: If promo is applied as required.

cancellation_details.description: Provides information related to rate cancellation criteria. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details about this data cluster.

date_after.description: Indicates when is cancellation allowed for a rate. This is the start date (of the date range) that the customer can cancel the booking to be eligible for *_refund amount. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details.

date_before.description: In dicates when is cancellation allowed for the rate. This is the last date (of the date range) that the customer can cancel a booking to be eligible for *_refund amount. See [Cancellations Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-cancellations#cancellation-details) for more details.

penalty_nights.description: The number of penalty nights deducted from refund.

source_currency.description: The source currency for amounts and charges.

source_processing_fee.description: The processing fee in source currency.

source_cancellation_fee.description: The cancellation fee in source currency for refund/cancellation.

source_refund.description: The refund amount in source currency if refund is applicable.

source_total_charges.description: The total charges for cancellation in source currency.

display_currency.description: The display currency for amounts and charges.

display_processing_fee.description: The processing fee in display currency.

display_cancellation_fee.description: The cancellation fee in display currency for refund/cancellation.

display_refund.description: The refund amount in display currency.

display_total_charges.description: The total charges for cancellation in display currency.

policy_data.description: Rate policies. It is imperative that you display the these policies.

items.example: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

display_price.description: The price displayed to the customer

source_price.description: TThe price charged to the customer for insurance.

ti_html.description: The HTML block to be displayed to the user if insurance is being offered. Use the provided HTML block and do not make changes to the HTML structure. You can use the `text_block` data or the `ti_html`

text_block.description: An array of string text blocks describing the insurance policy.

insurance_available.description: If insurance is available for a rate. This returns 1 if available.

refund_type.description: Indicates the refund type as to whether full refund, partial refund or no refund.

cvc_required.description: Indicates if the cvc code is required for payment card details. If this is `true` (required), you need to pass the `cvc_code` parameter with the `Express.Book` request in addition to the other required parameters.

language.description: Indicates the language of the delivered rate data values. Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) for more details.

items.example: {"sentence_one":{"summary":"first sentence","value":"In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction, the charge to your method of payment will include a charge for Taxes and Fees. This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain. Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location."},"sentence_two":{"summary":"second sentence","value":"For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services."},"sentence_three":{"summary":"third sentence","value":"Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply."},"sentence_four":{"summary":"fourth sentence","value":"Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ('GST') for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus."}}

selective_options.description: Includes any options selective to applicable features.

comments_allowed.description: If `comments` are accepted by the property (passed in `Book` request), this node will be returned as 1. See [special requests guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/non-hotel-accommodation#special-instructions) for more details.

language.description: Indicates the language of the hotel and room details.  Only selected data values are translated. See the [Language Support Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/languages) to learn more.

policy_data.text: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

hotel_data.name: Hotel Adlon Kempinski Berlin
hotel_data.hotel_description: The quintessence of luxury lodging, the Adlon is a legendary 5-star hotel located in Berlin’s Mitte, beside the Brandenburg Gate. State-of-the-art facilities include a double Michelin-star restaurant and a shopping arcade. With such a central location, the Hotel Adlon Kempinski allows direct access to some of Berlin’s main landmarks. The Holocaust Memorial, Checkpoint Charlie and Pariser Platz are all within a 10-minute walk. Rooms have a sophisticated allure thanks to antique furnishings with extravagant twists and marble bathrooms. They are equipped with WiFi, a modern media system and some offer views of the Brandenburg Gate. Sporting and relaxing amenities include a neoclassical indoor pool, an 2625 ft² gym, and a spa with Ayurveda treatments. Wild game specialtities and private dining are all available options.

pet_friendly.policy: Pets are allowed on request. Charges may apply.

cancellation_details.description: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

policy_data.title: Cancellation Policy
paragraph_data: For the room type and rate that you've selected, you are not allowed to change or cancel your reservation. If you cancel your room, you will still be charged for the full reservation amount.

policy_data.title: Age Restriction Disclosure
paragraph_data: The reservation holder must be 21 years of age or older.

policy_data.title: Guarantee Policy
paragraph_data: Reservation is guaranteed for arrival on the confirmed check-in date only. If you don't check-in to the hotel on the first day of your reservation and you do not alert the hotel in advance the remaining portion of your reservation will be canceled and you will not be entitled to a refund.

policy_data.title: Room Charge Disclosure
paragraph_data: Your credit card is charged the total cost at time of purchase. Prices and room availability are not guaranteed until full payment is received.

policy_data.title: Check-in Policy
paragraph_data: The reservation holder must present a valid photo ID and credit card at check-in.  The credit card is required for any additional hotel specific service fees or incidental charges or fees that may be charged by the hotel to the customer at checkout. These charges may be mandatory (e.g., resort fees) or optional (parking, phone calls or mini-bar charges) and are not included in the room rate.

policy_data.title: Occupancy Policy
paragraph_data: All rooms will accommodate up to 2 people. Requests for bed types (King, Queen, Double, etc.) or other request(including preferences for smoking or non-smoking rooms) should be requested through your confirmed hotel and cannot be guaranteed.

policy_data.title: Pets Policy
paragraph_data: Pets are permitted.

policy_data.title: Travel Insurance (Trip Protection)
paragraph_data: You will receive a letter of Confirmation and Certificate of Insurance/Policy via separate e-mail.#br##br#For more Information, Please visit #faqs#. Or, to manage your policy online, #allianz_click_here#. If you prefer, you may also directly contact Allianz Global Assistance's #allianz_cust_support# or call at 1-888-799-3063.#br##br#If you cancel your reservation, please call Allianz Global Assistance at 1-888-799-3063 to request a travel insurance refund or report a claim if cancelling for a covered reason.
Your credit card will be charged $23.32 for Hotel Insurance
Within 10 days, depending on your state of residence, you can receive a full refund on your premium if you're not satisfied and you haven't filed a claim or departed for your trip/event.

taxes_and_fees: In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction, the charge to your method of payment will include a charge for Taxes and Fees. This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including, without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes. In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel. The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you. The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs. The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain. Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your method of payment for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.

Depending on the property you stay at you may also be charged (i) certain mandatory hotel specific service fees, for example, resort fees (which typically apply to resort type destinations and, if applicable, may range from $10 to $40 per day), energy surcharges, newspaper delivery fees, in-room safe fees, tourism fees, or housekeeping fees and/or (ii) certain optional incidental fees, for example, parking charges, minibar charges, phone calls, room service and movie rentals, etc. These charges, if applicable, will be payable by you to the hotel directly at checkout. When you check in, a credit card or, in the hotel's discretion, a debit card, will be required to secure these charges and fees that you may incur during your stay. Please contact the hotel directly as to whether and which charges or service fees apply.

Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax ('GST') for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services. For bookings in Canada, the charges may also include destination marketing fees collected by the hotel and passed along to tourist bureaus.
For this transaction, the amount you were charged relating to Taxes was 74.67 USD. For this transaction, the amount you were charged for Service Fees was 0.00 USD.
