get.description: This API will provide a list of possible cities and hotels for a given search `string` using the endpoint `getAutoSuggestV2`.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: Search string that will enable a list of selection to be listed to the traveller.

parameters.name: combine_regions
parameters.description: If combine_regions is true, there will be regions data in the city data array that is returned.

parameters.name: get_airports
parameters.description: Include airports in search results.

parameters.name: get_cities
parameters.description: Include cities in search results.

parameters.name: get_regions
parameters.description: Include Regions in search results.

parameters.name: get_pois
parameters.description: Include Points of Interest in search results.

parameters.name: get_hotels
parameters.description: Include hotels in search results.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Number passed is the maximum number of results returned.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Method of ordering the results of the search.

parameters.name: show_all_cities
parameters.description: Will filter out cities with no hotels. Valid Options: False = filter out cities without hotels, True = show cities with and without hotels.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Method of sorting the results.

parameters.name: spellcheck
parameters.description: Apply strict spell checking when matching the search string for results.

getHotelAutoSuggestV2.description: The Hotel AutoSuggestV2 response structure for a successful request.

property_description.example: Freebies include an airport shuttle and Wi-Fi, and guests can take a dip all year round in the indoor pool and hot tub at the non-smoking Sandman Hotel and Suites, near the Winnipeg Airport. Traditional rooms supply free Wi-Fi and 42-inch flat-panel TVs at the mid-rise, non-smoking Sandman Hotel. Some of the 210 rooms also feature fully equipped kitchenettes, sofa beds or jetted tubs. Two on-site restaurants include a Denny's, which is open 24 hours a day and offers room service, and a steakhouse. The business and fitness centers keep guests focused, and the indoor pool and hot tub are perfect ways to unwind. Extra pluses include a 24-hour front desk and available parking. Pets are allowed for an extra fee. Right on the bus line, the Sandman Hotel is less than four miles from downtown Winnipeg and about a mile from Winnipeg James Armstrong Richardson International Airport. Golfers have their choice of courses, with at least six less than a half-hour from the hotel. On the banks of the Red River, downtown Winnipeg offers something for everyone at Assiniboine Park, a green space that provides a playground, conservatory, zoo and concert venue. Other attractions in Winnipeg include the Forks National Historic Site, the Canadian Museum for Human Rights and the Royal Canadian Mint.

hotels.property_description: Located in Lincoln and with Dewitt County Museum reachable within 41 km, Comfort Inn & Suites near Route 66 Award Winning Gold Hotel 2021 provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. The property is around 5.4 km from Abraham Lincoln Memorial Hospital Heliport, 5.7 km from Lincoln and 6.4 km from Bell. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre for guests. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. The units include a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available daily at the hotel. Burton View is 6.5 km from Comfort Inn & Suites near Route 66 Award Winning Gold Hotel 2021, while Logan County Airport is 8.1 km away. The nearest airport is Abraham Lincoln Capital Airport, 47 km from the accommodation.
hotels.hotel_name: Comfort Inn & Suites near Route 66 Award Winning Gold Hotel 2021

hotels.property_description: Located along Trans Canada Highway 1, this motel is 2 minutes’ drive from John Blumberg Golf Course and John Blumberg Softball Complex. It features an indoor heated pool and hot tub as well as rooms with free WiFi. A 32-inch flat-screen TV with expanded cable channels is offered in each room at Motel 6 Headingley Winnipeg West. The traditionally styled rooms also offer a small fridge. Guests at this property can enjoy a daily continental breakfast featuring muffins, fruit and coffee. The pet-friendly property also offers laundry facilities. Free parking is available on site. Assiniboia Downs and MTS Ice Plex are less than 1 km from Motel 6 Winnipeg West. St. James Art Club is less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

Boasting an indoor saltwater pool with a waterslide, Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Winnipeg Airport is just a 3 minute drive from the Winnipeg International Airport. Complimentary WiFi, parking and a hot breakfast buffet are featured. A 42" cable LCD TV is equipped in each of the guestrooms. They also include a microwave, fridge and coffee-tea-facilities. A hairdryer can be found in the bathroom. Other facilities include a hot tub and fitness centre. Kids can enjoy the on-site paddling pool. Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham is located within a 15 minute drive from Winnipeg city centre and the Manitoba Museum. The Polo Shopping Centre is 3 km away.
hotels.hotel_name: Days Inn & Suites by Wyndham Winnipeg Airport Manitoba

get.description: This API provides details of a specified hotel using the `getHotelDetails` endpoint. Note that this endpoint is is used to retrieve hotel details dynamically during the booking path. Alternatively you can use the `getBOF2.Downloads.Hotel.Rooms` download endpoint for an efficient experience (see more details about [Hotels Content API here](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/content-api-overview#hotels)).

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The PPN Hotel ID for the desired property.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: guest_score_breakdown
parameters.description: Toggle guest score breakdown on and off.  Valid Options: True or False

parameters.name: id_lookup
parameters.description: Allows non-PPN Hotel IDs to be searched in the database.  Valid Options: True or False

parameters.name: image_size
parameters.description: The size of the image returned.  Valid Options: small (60px), medium(300 to 312px) or large(500 to 800px).

parameters.name: important_info
parameters.description: Toggles important info. Important info is extra details regarding the specified hotel. By default, important info is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: nearby
parameters.description:
Toggles nearby data. Nearby data is extra information regarding the specified hotel's location. Nearby data can include `city_data`, `airport_data`, and `poi_category_data`. 
            By default, nearby data is excluded from the response. To include nearby data, set `nearby` to `1`. 
            To include `city_data` within nearby data, include a `city_limit` parameter to a value greater than 1.  
            To include `airport_data` within nearby data, include a `airport_limit` parameter to a value greater than 1.
            To include `poi_category_data` within nearby data, include a `poi_limit` parameter to a value greater than 1.

parameters.name: photos
parameters.description: Toggles photo data. By default, hotel photo data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: plugins
parameters.description: Provides extra information regarding plugins for the specified hotel. To include specific plugin information, include the ID of the plugin as a comma separated value to the `plugins` parameter.

parameters.name: promo
parameters.description: Toggle the hotel's promo data on and off. By default, promo data is excluded in the response. To include promo data in the response, set `promo` to 1.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Toggle recent sales.  Valid Options: True, False

parameters.name: reviews
parameters.description: Toggle hotel review data. By default, review data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = On.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: videos
parameters.description: Toggle videos.  Valid Options: True or False

hotel_description.example: A 24-hour airport shuttle, a tasty complimentary breakfast and free internet access are a few good reasons to book La Quinta Inn & Suites LAX, say our guests. All 279 rooms in the 10-story hotel feature pillowtop mattresses and free high-speed internet access. Microwaves and mini-fridges are available by request. Wake up to a free waffle breakfast and/or a morning workout in the fitness center. Check your email in the business center or make a splash in the outdoor pool with sun deck. Grab snacks at the convenience store or dine at the on-site restaurant and lounge. Laundry facilities keep you looking sharp. Shuttle service is available to Manhattan Beach for a nominal fee. The 24-hour shuttle from the airport is complimentary. Parking on-site is available for an added fee. Pets are welcome. Located two miles from Los Angeles International Airport, La Quinta is close to fun in the sun. Drive six miles north to Villa Marina Marketplace and prime people watching on Venice Beach. Playa del Rey, a more laid-back beach, is four miles west. Watch the sunset from Santa Monica Pier eight miles northwest or window-shop on Rodeo Drive or Sunset Strip, both 20 minutes north. Downtown attractions, including the historic theater district, Museum of Contemporary Art, Staples Center and Chinatown, are 15 miles north.

hotel_rank.description: Hotel rank data used in sorting.

review_score_data.description: Hotel review scores such as cleanliness score.

cug_enabled.description: This will return 1 if this property provides discounted rates for closed user groups.

standard_check_in.description: Indicates whether the property provides traditional check-in such as a hotel/reception desk. See the [Check-in information guide section](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/non-hotel-accommodation#check-in-information) for more details.

photo_data.description: Only available if `photos=true` is passed in request.

recent_sales_data.description: Only available if `recent=true` is passed in request.

pet_friendly.description: If pets are allowed in the property.

hotel_data.name: Hilton Memphis
hotel_data.hotel_description: Located in the heart of the Business District, this East Memphis hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour business center and free airport shuttle services. Free WiFi access is available. Every room at Hilton Memphis provides a flat-screen HDTV with premium cable and movie channels, along with a coffee maker and ironing facilities. Select rooms also include a seating area and a wet bar. The Ridgelake Restaurant is open for breakfast and offers freshly-made classic American favorites with a twist. Guests can grab a drink and a bite while admiring views of the hotel grounds at The Lobby Bar. Provisions Market offers a selection of to-go pizzas, sandwiches and entrees. In-room dining services are available for guest convenience. The hotel offers a 24-hour business center with modern business amenities, including fax, copy and video conferencing services. Over 30,000 square feet of flexible event space is also offered at the hotel. Beale Street, Graceland and FedEx Forum are all 13 mi away from the hotel. Shelby Farms Park is 5 mi away, while Memphis International Airport is a 13-minute drive from the hotel.

hotel_data.name: Hilton Memphis
hotel_data.hotel_description: Located in the heart of the Business District, this East Memphis hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour business center and free airport shuttle services. Free WiFi access is available. Every room at Hilton Memphis provides a flat-screen HDTV with premium cable and movie channels, along with a coffee maker and ironing facilities. Select rooms also include a seating area and a wet bar. The Ridgelake Restaurant is open for breakfast and offers freshly-made classic American favorites with a twist. Guests can grab a drink and a bite while admiring views of the hotel grounds at The Lobby Bar. Provisions Market offers a selection of to-go pizzas, sandwiches and entrees. In-room dining services are available for guest convenience. The hotel offers a 24-hour business center with modern business amenities, including fax, copy and video conferencing services. Over 30,000 square feet of flexible event space is also offered at the hotel. Beale Street, Graceland and FedEx Forum are all 13 mi away from the hotel. Shelby Farms Park is 5 mi away, while Memphis International Airport is a 13-minute drive from the hotel.

get.description: This API returns a list of photos for a given list of hotels using the `getPhotos` endpoint. Note that this endpoint is used to retrieve hotel photos dynamically during the booking path. Alternatively you can use the `getBOF2.Downloads.Hotel.Photos` download endpoint for an efficient experience (see more details about [Photos Content API here](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/content-api-overview#photos)).

parameters.name: hotel_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated string of PPN hotel ids.

getHotelPhotos.description: The HotelPhotos response structure for a successful request.

results.description: The results are grouped under this cluster.

photo_data.description: An array of strings with photo links.

time.description: Time elapsed to generate the response.

status_code.description:
Error Codes

Status Code Message
5050 Hotel.Photos: hotel_ids must be a comma separated string of integers.
5051 Hotel.Photos: hotel_ids does not contain any hotel_id.
5052 Hotel.Photos: No photos were found.
1.1242.1 Hotel.Photos: Invalid email size type.

getHotelPhotos.description: The standard error response from the server.

get.description: This API can be used in the booking path to retrieve a list of reviews for a specified hotel.

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The PPN Hotel ID for the desired property.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: This is a booking.com inventory only field that allows you to filter results by a csv of language codes you pass in,

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used with `offset` to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the number of properties to return with each call.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used with `limit` to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the number of property results to skip (starting at 0) before returning results.

parameters.name: only_verified_guests
parameters.description: Set on to only include only reviews with verified_guests.  A verified guest is a guest that has had a review verified by aaa.  Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: CSV of sorting order metrics.  Valid Options: creation_date, average_rating, or verified_guest followed by .asc or .desc.

getHotelReviews.description: The Hotel Reviews response structure for a successful request.

results.description: The results are grouped under this cluster.

status_code.description:
Error Codes

Status Code Message
1.822.1 Hotel.Reviews: hotel_id must be numeric.
1.822.2 Hotel.Reviews: Limit must be numeric.
1.822.3 Hotel.Reviews: Offset must be numeric.
1.822.4 Hotel.Reviews: Applayer filter is not set.
1.822.5 Hotel.Reviews: All inventories disabled.
1.822.6 Hotel.Reviews: Hotel information not found.
1.822.8 Hotel.Reviews: No reviews found as Offset value exceeds the number of reviews.
1.822.9 Hotel.Reviews: order_by is not valid.
1.822.10 Hotel.Reviews: Languages must be a csv of language abbreviations ex/ en,fr.

getHotelReviews.description: The standard error response from the server.

hotel_ids.description: Comma separated string of PPN hotel ids.

code.description: PIN number to be used when contacting Booking.com customer support to manage a booking.

city_id.description: Accepts a single PPN City ID.

latitude.description: Search for properties availability around a specific `latitude` coordinate. We recommend that you use the `radius` parameter when performing a latitude/longitude search to get the most results.

longitude.description: Search for properties availability around a specific `longitude` coordinate. We recommend that you use the `radius` parameter when performing a latitude/longitude search to get the most results.

partner_tripid.description: This is a unique partner trip identifier generated by the partner. This can be used to link a PPN booking record to a partner's sales record and look up reservations.

refclickid.description:
A custom field that can be commonly used to track marketing attribution. This will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales. Only the following characters or types of characters are supported in the refclickid value:
  • digits
  • letters
  • space character
  • hyphen ( - )
  • back slash ( \ )
  • dollar sign ($)
  • percent sign ( % )
  • period ( . )
  • colon ( : )
  • caret ( ^ )
  • underscore ( _ )
  • pipe or vertical bar ( | )
  • tilde ( ~ )

source_currency.description: The customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

display_currency.description: The display currency only. Customer is charged in source currency. See [Price Details Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-price-details) for detailed explanations.

type.description: Fee type.
Fee type.

num_adults.description: Number of adults in the booking.

num_children.description: Number of children in the booking.

occupancy_limit.description: The occupancy limit for number of adults + children. See the [Rate Information Guide](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/room-and-rate) for more details.

ppn_bundle.description: The bundle value binds together the search criteria for reference in a subsequent API call.

status.description: A text status that represents the status of the request/response

status_code.description: An integer status code that represents the status of the request/response

tracking_id.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through PPN and partner systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

star_rating.description: Hotel's star rating. This is a number between 1 and 5. See more details in the [Hotels Content Guide here](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-content#star-rating).

star_rating_string.description: Hotel's star rating. This is a value between 1 and 5. See more details in the [Hotels Content Guide here](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/guides/id/hotel-content#star-rating).

sid.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

format.description: The format of your request. We recommend requesting json2 format response.

check_in_time.description: Standard check-in before time of the hotel

check_out_time.description: Standard check-out after time of the hotel

format.name: format
format.description: The format of your request. We recommend requesting json2 format response.

client_user_agent.name: client_user_agent
client_user_agent.description: User agent string used to detect device type when obtaining mobile rates. This string specifies the browser, version, and operating system in the device request. You need to activate mobile rates through Account Management team first.
client_user_agent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; SM-G981B) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.162 Mobile Safari/537.36

field_rejectlist.name: field_rejectlist
field_rejectlist.description: Comma separated list of elements to remove from API response. Useful to limit data transmission of unused data, for example removing amenity information (`field_rejectlist=amenity_data`) can significantly reduce the size of the response.

radius.name: radius
radius.description: Used to get results within a given radius (in miles) from the search location. We recommend that you use this parameter when performing a latitude/longitude search to get the most results.

refclickid.name: refclickid
refclickid.description:
A custom field that can be commonly used to track marketing attribution. This will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales. For deep link implementations, pass this parameter with the search request to include the refclickid data into the generated external URL. Only the following characters or types of characters are supported in the refclickid value:
  • digits
  • letters
  • space character
  • hyphen ( - )
  • back slash ( \ )
  • dollar sign ($)
  • percent sign ( % )
  • period ( . )
  • colon ( : )
  • caret ( ^ )
  • underscore ( _ )
  • pipe or vertical bar ( | )
  • tilde ( ~ )

unmapped_rooms.name: unmapped_rooms
unmapped_rooms.description: Pass the `unmapped_rooms=true` in the request to include unmapped room IDs in the search results. Refer to the [Mapping Room ID to Room Content Guide section here](https://pricelinepartnernetwork.com/developers/pps-api/guides/guide/room-content#mapping-room-id-to-room-content) for more details.

ApiKey.description: When you register for a Priceline Partner Account you will be assigned an API key to use with all your requests.
ApiKey.name: api_key

RefID.description: The identifier assigned to your api key
RefID.name: refid
